info.title: F5 Distributed Cloud Services API for ves.io.schema.operate.crl
info.description: Proto definitions for CRL refresh in VER

post.description: Resync CRL by downloading from the server again

401.description: Returned when operation is not authorized

403.description: Returned when there is no permission to access resource

404.description: Returned when resource is not found

409.description: Returned when operation on resource is conflicting with current value

429.description: Returned when operation has been rejected as it is happening too frequently

500.description: Returned when server encountered an error in processing API

503.description: Returned when service is unavailable temporarily

504.description: Returned when server timed out processing request

parameters.name: namespace
parameters.description:
Namespace

x-example: "system"
Namespace for which the request is sent (system)

parameters.name: site
parameters.description:
Site Name

x-example: "value"
Name of the site for which request is sent

crlResyncCRLRequest.description: Request to trigger resync of CRL in VER
crlResyncCRLRequest.title: Resync CRL Request

name.description:
Exclusive with [uid]
 Name of the CRL object
name.title: CRL Name

namespace.description:
Namespace for which the request is sent (system)

Example: ` "system"`
namespace.title: Namespace

site.description:
Name of the site for which request is sent

Example: ` "value"`
site.title: Site Name

uid.description:
Exclusive with [name]
 UID of the CRL object
uid.title: CRL UID
